name: GLOBAL HEALTH ADVOCATES
goal:
Global Health Advocates (GHA) is an NGO.
It aims to ensure public policies ensure the right to health for all. In partnership with civil society, our mission is political advocacy to ensure policies and
resources are effectively addressing health inequalities.
interests: Budget, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Access to Medicines
AMR
MFF
European Development Policies
European Trust Fund for Africa
European Fund for Sustainable Development
Post Cotonou
Infectious Diseases
FP9 and Horizon 2020
